basic.description:
A study of representative works by African and the Caribbean writers. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Ecrits de la Francophonie

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or (FREN212 and FREN220) or FREN221.
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN351 or FREN451
